metadata.name: Flying Circus - 31st December 2022
metadata.description:
Radical Productions presents "Incendia"  
FLYING CIRCUS  - December 31st 2022 ===============================

Anstascia  
Art Department  
Audiofly  
DJ Three  
Matthew Dekay  
Yokoo  
Yulia Niko  
Muan  
Nomad  
 ===============================  
This NFT entitles the holder and one guest VIP admission to the backstage area at the Radical Productions event on 31st December in Tulum, 2022.

(This package also offers the holders no-queue privileges and 2x 2500 pesos bracelets of credit for the event. 5000 pesos total).  
This NFT MUST be presented at the venue on THE MOBILE WALLET of the token owner for admission. (Metamask.io is recommended).  
No pictures, photographs, printouts or other methods of verification will be accepted.  
======================================================

Revolutionize your events with Radical! Our parties are powered by cutting-edge technologies, allowing guests and suppliers to transact in pioneering ways. Experience the freedom of a new financial system through our NFT platform - making each event an unforgettable experience for everyone involved.
